div.p: NARRATOR: Just as we are born with a trigger level, we're also born with an initial tolerance level, which varies from person to person.
NARRATOR: But unlike our trigger level, our tolerance level can change over time. When we drink to the point of impairment, our body automatically increases our tolerance level.
NARRATOR: And a high tolerance makes us less sensitive to alcohol, so we are less aware of how impaired we are.
